prompt:
Use case: illustration-story
Asset type: game character accessory sprite
Primary request: Pokemon GBA style pixel art baseball cap accessory for a 16x24 character sprite. Front-facing cap with small brim, centered, designed to sit on top of a lobster character's head. Transparent background, crisp pixels, no anti-aliasing.
Scene/background: transparent background
Style/medium: 16-bit pixel art, crisp pixels, no anti-aliasing
Composition/framing: centered accessory on a 16x24 sprite grid, occupies top or middle as appropriate, full transparency elsewhere
Constraints: no character body, no text, no extra objects, transparent background
Avoid: blurry, painterly, 3D render, watermark
